segments.text: This scene is honestly infuriating me a little bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can that woman be so completely unaware of the overflowing sink?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, making a huge mess, and she stands there, utterly oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a waste of water, a potential for significant damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already imagine the ruined cabinets and flooring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children! They're going to break their necks on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster waiting to happen, all while the adult is lost in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout at her to turn off the faucet!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of inattention is almost unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me genuinely angry to see such carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is incredibly frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is going to be ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's absolutely disgusting how much water is on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
